vision.get_colors¶

vision.get_colors(image_path, color_count=1)[source]¶

Get predominant color(s) in a given image

Parameters

  • image_path (string) – path to image to query

  • color_count (int) – number of colors to return

Returns

colors – a list of predominant color(s) in image

Return type

list

Examples

Find the predominant colors in “./test.jpg” .. code-block:: python

from cloudburst import vision as cbv colorlist = cbv.get_colors(“./test.jpg”, 2) print(colorlist)

cloudburst
